    • Method Detail

      • addOffer

        public TripOffer addOffer(User owner,
                 TripOfferDescription description)
                   throws RouteNotFoundException
        Adds an offer to the database.
        Parameters:
        owner - The driver that offers the trip
        description - the description of the offer.
        Returns:
        the newly created TripOffer
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException - is thrown, if there was no route from the requested start to the requested destination.

      • findOffersByDriver

        public java.util.List<TripOffer> findOffersByDriver(User driver)
        Lists all the offers that belong to a specific driver.
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver that you want to know the offers from.
        Returns:
        A list of TripOffer with all the offers of the driver.

      • findOffer

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<TripOffer> findOffer(long offerId)
        Finds an offer by its id.
        Parameters:
        offerId - the id of the offer.
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains the offer if it exists.

      • deleteOffer

        public void deleteOffer(TripOffer offer)
        Deletes an offer from the database
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer that should be deleted.

      • updateOffer

        public TripOffer updateOffer(TripOffer offer,
                    TripOfferUpdate offerUpdate)
        Update the status of an offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer that should be updated.
        offerUpdate - the update status that should be applied to the offer.
        Returns:
        The updated offer.

      • queryOffers

        public TripQueryResult queryOffers(User passenger,
                          TripQueryDescription queryDescription)
                            throws RouteNotFoundException
        Requests a query for offers that match for this passenger.
        Parameters:
        passenger - The passenger that wants to join a trip.
        queryDescription - The description of his query
        Returns:
        A TripQueryResult for this request-
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException - is thrown, if there is no route from the passenger's starting position to his final destination.

      • findAllReservations

        public java.util.List<SuperTripReservation> findAllReservations()
        Get a list of all the reservations that exists.
        Returns:
        returns all trip reservations from the database.

      • findReservation

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<SuperTripReservation> findReservation(long reservationId)
        Find a specific reservation by its id.
        Parameters:
        reservationId - the id of the SuperTripReservation that you want to get.
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains the reservation

      • joinTrip

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<SuperTrip> joinTrip(SuperTripReservation tripReservation)
        Join a specific offer by a SuperTripReservation. A SuperTrip for this query will be created and a notification is sent to the drivers (might be multiple!), that they have to either decline or accept.
        Parameters:
        tripReservation - The reservation for that the user want to join the trip
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains a join request if the reservation was still valid.

      • findTrip

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<SuperTrip> findTrip(long tripId)
        Returns a single SuperTrip.

      • findAllTrips

        public java.util.List<SuperTrip> findAllTrips(User passenger)
        Returns all SuperTrips that belong to a passenger.

      • findAllJoinRequests

        public java.util.List<JoinTripRequest> findAllJoinRequests()
        Returns all JoinTripRequests, regardless of their state or user.

      • findAllJoinRequests

        public java.util.List<JoinTripRequest> findAllJoinRequests(User passengerOrDriver,
                                                  boolean showOnlyPassengerAccepted)
        Returns all JoinRequests that are related to a specific user and possibly have as status JoinTripStatus.PASSENGER_ACCEPTED.
        Parameters:
        passengerOrDriver - the user to which all JoinTripRequests should belong.
        showOnlyPassengerAccepted - true if you want only get all the requests that are accepted by passenger side.
        Returns:
        a list of JoinTripRequests.

      • findAllJoinRequests

        public java.util.List<JoinTripRequest> findAllJoinRequests(long offerId)
        Finds all JoinTripRequest that are related to a certain offer.
        Parameters:
        offerId - the offer id for that all JoinTripRequests should be found.
        Returns:
        A List of JoinTripRequests for this specific offer.

      • findDriverAcceptedJoinRequests

        public java.util.List<JoinTripRequest> findDriverAcceptedJoinRequests(User passengerOrDriver)
        Find all the JoinTripRequest that were accepted by the driver (but are not in the car).
        Parameters:
        passengerOrDriver - Either the driver or the passenger that are related to the JoinTripRequest
        Returns:
        A list of JoinTripRequests that have as status JoinTripStatus.DRIVER_ACCEPTED and are related to the passed user.

      • findJoinRequest

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<JoinTripRequest> findJoinRequest(long joinRequestId)
        Finds a JoinTripRequest by its id.
        Parameters:
        joinRequestId - the id of the JoinTripRequest
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains the respective JoinTripRequest if it exists.

      • updateJoinRequestAcceptance

        public JoinTripRequest updateJoinRequestAcceptance(JoinTripRequest joinRequest,
                                          boolean passengerAccepted)
        Updates a running join request if the driver either accepts or decline the passenger
        Parameters:
        joinRequest - The join request that needs to be updated.
        passengerAccepted - true if the passenger should be accepted, false if not.
        Returns:
        the updated join request.

      • updateJoinRequestPassengerEnterCar

        Parameters:
        joinRequest - The join request that needs to be updated.
        Returns:
        the updated join request.

      • updateJoinRequestPassengerExitCar

        Parameters:
        joinRequest - The join request that needs to be updated.
        Returns:
        the updated join request.

        Returns:
